article_title: U.S. to Expand Military Lending Act in Effort to Protect Service Members
article_text:
WASHINGTON—President Barack Obama announced Tuesday a significant expansion of regulations that protect U.S. military-service members and their families from predatory lending practices, making it harder for financial firms to charge high interest rates under current laws.

In announcing the implementation of regulations under the Military Lending Act, which was first passed in 2006, Mr. Obama is aiming at loopholes that have allowed...
